abstract: Weak margins in refining hurt results at the largest European and American oil companies.
snippet: Weak margins in refining hurt results at the largest European and American oil companies.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Royal Dutch Shell, Europe’s largest company by market capitalization, reported sharply lower earnings for its third quarter as weak profit margins in refining, and disruption in Nigeria, one of Shell’s leading production areas, hurt results.

headline.main: Profit Margins Squeeze Shell and Exxon Mobil
headline.print_headline: Profit Margins Squeeze Shell and Exxon Mobil

abstract: Weak margins in refining hurt results at the largest European and American oil companies.
snippet: Weak margins in refining hurt results at the largest European and American oil companies.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON — Exxon Mobil and Royal Dutch Shell reported sharply lower third-quarter earnings on Thursday because of weaker profit margins in refining and a sluggish global economy.

headline.main: Profit Margins Squeeze Exxon Mobil and Shell
headline.print_headline: Profits Dive at Exxon Mobil and Shell

byline.original: By Clifford Krauss and Stanley Reed
